an6.111:4.3: The elements of sensual desire, ill will, and harming.
an6.111:4.5: To give up these three things you should develop three things.
an6.111:4.7: You should develop the element of renunciation to give up the element of sensual desire, the element of love to give up the element of ill will, and the element of kindness to give up the element of harming.
an6.111:4.8: These are the three things you should develop to give up those three things.”
